thread.title: BRIEF-China Traditional Chinese Medicine Announces Investments In Jiangkang Pharmaceutical And Shuanglanxing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Traditional Chinese Medicine Announces Investments In Jiangkang Pharmaceutical And Shuanglanxing

organizations.name: china traditional chinese medicine holdings co ltd

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - China Traditional Chinese Medicine Holdings Co Ltd:
* UNIT ‍TO INJECT CAPITAL OF RMB46.94 MILLION & RMB35.10 MILLION INTO JIANGKANG PHARMACEUTICAL & SHUANGLANXING RESPECTIVELY​
* TIANJIANG PHARMACEUTICAL WILL HOLD 51% EQUITY INTEREST IN EACH OF JIANGKANG PHARMACEUTICAL AND SHUANGLANXING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
